name: df-fusgr
body: |- wceq(cfusgr, crab(s0, cusgr, wcel(cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), cfn)))
comment: Define the class of all finite undirected simple graphs without loops (called "finite simple graphs" in the following). A finite simple graph is an undirected simple graph of finite order, i.e. with a finite set of vertices. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Oct-2020.)
